name: Hellworld! (itch)
description:
Welcome to Hellworld!

"Hellworld!" is an in-development 2D side scrolling adventure game.  On the morning of his 13th birthday, Seth wakes up to find out that he's the literal son of Lucifer, and that he has inherited the power of Despair.

Fill your enemies with Despair!

 Using this ability of Despair, Seth can take control of his enemies by possessing them on his journey to rally his half-siblings & defeat his tyrannical father.

Traverse the strange land of Hellworld!

Fight your way through hoards of enemies in each unique level, which are each loosely based off of the concept of the Seven Deadly Sins.

This title is currently in development! The downloadable .zip file is a demo. Followers will be notified when the full game is released.

Projected Release Date: April 2023
